text: Phwk k̄heā khụ̄x brrdā p̄hū̂ pt̩is̄eṭh ṣ̄rạthṭhā læa pid kận phwk cêā h̄ı̂ h̄ạn h̄̀āng cā kmạs̄yidxạl ḥa rxm læa kār cheụ̄xd s̄ạtw̒ phlī thī̀ t̄hūk kạkkạn wị̂ mi h̄ı̂ brrlu s̄ū̀ thī̀ cheụ̄xd k̄hxng mạn læa h̄āk michı̀ pherāa mī brrdā p̄hū̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā chāy læa brrdā p̄hū̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā h̄ỵing sụ̀ng phwk cêā mị̀rū̂ cạk phwk k̄heā phwk cêā k̆ ca ḳh̀ā phwk k̄heā læ̂w k̆ ca k̀x h̄ı̂ keid thos̄ʹ kæ̀ phwk cêā pherāa phwk k̄heā doy mị̀rū̂ tạw thậngnī̂ pheụ̄̀x xạllxḥˌ ca thrng h̄ı̂ p̄hū̂ thī̀ phraxngkh̒ thrng pras̄ngkh̒ k̄hêā xyū̀ nı khwām mettā k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ h̄āk phwk k̄heā yæk xxk cāk kạn næ̀nxn reā k̆ ca lngthos̄ʹ brrdā p̄hū̂ pt̩is̄eṭh ṣ̄rạthṭhā nı h̄mū̀ phwk k̄heā sụ̀ng kār lngthos̄ʹ xạn cĕbpwd
